New Segmentation Fault (Alpha 0.1.5) update.

More mobs, more blocks, more puzzles, and less bugs!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Segmentation Fault (Alpha 0.1.1)

This is a game I put together in Eclipse using Java over the last year. It's a 2D Style platformer with some action and puzzles.

Guide your character to Victory using friendly blocks to help you overcome traps, thwart enemies, and solve neon puzzles.

This is free. Feel free to donate, but this is early work and still in development. I'm sure it won't work right for some people (not to mention it's still full of bugs) but give it a try and have fun!

Controls

Movement: WASD

Jump: Space/W

Place Block: RightMouse

Remove Block: LeftMouse

Switch to gun: Shift (Not sure If this will stay in game)

Mute: M

Select Item: Scroll or 1,2,3,4

Open Inventory (Level Builder Mode Only): E

Menu: ESC

Some Things to Look Out For:

-May run slow on some computers.

-Screen size may not fit your screen and full screen doesn't work.

-Limited sound effects and only 7 music tracks

-Music track is selected randomly at the start of a new level

-Pressing "Cancel" when naming a level will undo all progress.

-Win Screen needs work

-Most likely other bugs

Please Remember
I'm doing this as one person, I'm not a music composer or an artist.

Thank you for your support! I hope this works for you.

Also if you make any cool levels, they will be saved in the custom folder as .txt files, so you can share them quite easily.

Also the cat thing you play as is named Iool (as in iooL), and yes it is a lame joke.
